definitions.title: Shaph.
definitions.body: as loan-word fr. As. šû-ṣû, û-še-ṣû, bring out, √ aṣû ([[וחא]], BH [[יחא]], = Aram. [[יְעָא]], cf. Nö:GGA 1884, 1019), Dl:l. c. Hpt:1. c. K:1. c.; Targum [[שֵׁיחִי]] complete, put an end to, also come to an end, pass. be finished, Chr-Pal. 4ys.y Schulth:Lex. 205);—finish temple: Pf. 3 ms. ´[[שׁ]]: Ezr 6:15, but read prob. 3 mpl. [[שֵׁיחִיו]] K:§ 43:1 ad fin. Berthol Gu:Hpt (so LXX Vulgate); > Pf. pass. Be-Ry.
